title: The Perfect Tenant
description:
The Perfect Tenant: Steven LaChance found the perfect home… or, did the home find him?

Ghosty: When your kid tells you she’s just seen a ghost, you might want to believe her.
itunes:title: The Perfect Tenant
itunes:subtitle: The Perfect Tenant Steven LaChance and his kids were starting over. They had a new house, and they were ready for a new beginning. The only thing was, their landlady was a bit…different. Get more information about Steven’s work and his book, The Uninvite
author: stats@snapjudgment.org (Snap Judgment)
itunes:author: Snap Judgment and WNYC Studios
itunes:summary:
The Perfect Tenant: Steven LaChance found the perfect home… or, did the home find him?
Ghosty: When your kid tells you she’s just seen a ghost, you might want to believe her.
